places.name: Sloans
places.description: Decadent venue over 3 floors with Grand Ballroom, stunning central staircase and outside courtyard. Great cocktails and live music!

places.name: Gin71
places.description: Cosy venue in Virginia Court, great cocktails and boozy afternoon teas with an outdoor courtyard.

places.name: Tingle
places.description: All-day bar with a huge drinks menu, simple food and a nightly pre-club party with live DJs.

places.name: Hillhead Bookclub
places.description: Characterful space with cocktails, ping-pong, retro computer games, vintage fairs and bingo.

places.name: The Piper Whisky Bar
places.description: Airy bar with wood-furnished interior, for draught beers, whiskies, pub grub and live music.

places.name: Alston Bar & Beef
places.description: Smart, cellar-like restaurant and gin bar with mood lighting, for carefully sourced Scottish steak.

places.name: The Anchor Line
places.description: Opulent New York-style bistro serving Scottish produce in the former first class booking offices.

places.name: Meat Bar
places.description: Hip basement venue for Scottish and American craft beers, home-smoked meats and savoury cocktails.

places.name: Fanny Trollopes
places.description: Buzzy neighbourhood bistro serving seasonal meat and fish in a cosy, candlelit dining room.

places.name: Ubiquitous Chip
places.description: Artistic brasserie dishes that display their provenance, served in a leafy space with fairy lights.
